current_state: Siloed expertise in Backend and DevOps roles.
recommended_action: Allocate 4 hours per sprint for the Backend Developer to shadow the DevOps Engineer on Terraform and GitHub Actions, and vice-versa for the DevOps Engineer on NestJS service basics.
expected_benefit: Reduces key-person dependency by 30%. Improves collaboration and code review quality.
success_metrics: Backend dev can independently make minor IaC changes. DevOps dev can debug basic service issues.
roi_calculation: Mitigates risk of project stall worth >$50,000 in delay costs.

current_state: All team members show significant capacity surplus (under 50% utilization).
recommended_action: Re-evaluate task estimates or assign team members to a secondary, lower-priority project to run in parallel.
expected_benefit: Increases overall organizational productivity by ~50% by utilizing available capacity.
success_metrics: Team utilization increases to a sustainable ~75% across two projects.
roi_calculation: Effectively doubles the value delivered by the team for the same cost.
